mapper.select: SELECT a.TargetSeq , a.SrcTableNm , a.SrcDatabase , a.LastSyncTime , a.LastStatus , a.UseYn , a.DomainID , a.TargetDatabase , a.TargetTableNm , a.SortSeq , a.ConditionSQL , b.* , c.DomainCode FROM covi_smart4j.sys_dbsync_target a JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_datasource b ON a.datasourceseq = b.datasourceseq AND a.UseYn = 'Y' JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_domain c ON c.domainid = a.domainid WHERE a.ScheduleType is null OR a.ScheduleType = '' ORDER BY a.DomainID, a.sortseq
